job.title: Lead/Principal Software Engineer, Tableau Prototyping team
job.description: emTo get the best candidate experience please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating effortsbrbremstrong Job Category strongProducts and Technologystrong Job Details brbrstrongstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrbrustrongTableaus Prototype Engineering team designs and develops prototypes of early ideas that could lead to new features functionality or even products with a goal of quickly proving out ideas before we take them to production Were looking for generalists who love to tackle complex issues and excel working on ambiguous problems Join us to leverage your creativity and experience to imagine and create new capabilities or products that change how our customers analyze manage model and engage with their databrbrstrong Some o strongstrong f your responsibilities include brstrongulli Collaborating with designers researchers and engineers to come up with new ideas and ways to implement them lili Participating and contributing in brainstorming design and architecture sessions lili Design ing and develop ing software which demonstrates how new concepts can be built and how they can provide customer value lili Documenting and sharing your findings with a broad audience in mind lili Mentor ing others to help them develop their technical and leadership skills brliulstronguWho You Arebrustrongulli Technically Savvy You have 7 years of real experience designing and delivering userfocused software Youre familiar with more than one of C Java and JavaScript lili Flexible You must feel comfortable stretching yourself into environments and programming languages you might not be as familiar with and can work from the userfacing interface to the backend wherever it lives You arent limited to C Java and JavaScript lili Team Player You enjoy collaborating with learning from and teaching other folks from multiple disciplines Youre comfortable with ambiguous and rapidly changing projects lili Thorough Even in the early phases of a project your code just works its robust performant scalable and welltested lili Communicator Whether your project was successful or not you can share the lessons youve learned with the broader organization lili Intellectually Curious You seek to continuously expand your areas of expertise learn new ways to do things  and understand why things are the way they are lili Educated You have at least a bachelors degree or the equivalent in computer science or another relevant field lili You are a Recruiter Tableau hires company builders and in this role you will be asked to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world brliulstrong Accommodations brbrstrongIf you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Formbrbrstrong Posting Statement brbrstrongAt Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay employee resource groups inclusive benefits and more Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefitsbrbruSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender perception or identity national origin age marital status protected veteran status or disability status uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes uSalesforcecomu and uSalesforceorgu will not pay any thirdparty agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with uSalesforcecomu or uSalesforceorgu brbrSalesforce welcomes all
